attributes.action: Provide integrated public transport funded by ALL and not just motorists before introduction of the road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Road taxing is fine if there is an alternative but there is not. Since the intention is that all will use it, ALL (not just the motorist) must pay. This fixes the primary reason people are forced to waste their lives in cars, resulting in reduced congestion, emmissions and our overall carbon footprint.

Fixing also includes the rural areas which the government forgets exist.
